entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:53 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
